result.title: Chain of Bridging Narratives
result.description: A series of events will be organised to increase engagement of these groups in science In them stakeholders from the vulnerable groups participating in the project will record a brief testimony eg oneminute recording with mobile phone of critical events of their engagement in science and the benefits for their communities Meetings will be organised in particular communities to share these narratives and generate new ones The chain of narratives will be shared online

result.title: Protocol on role, functions and communication aspects of the Hubs Coordinator
result.description: This deliverable will consist in a set of guidelines setting the rules and internal organization of the Hubs coordination in order to make possible the setting of a common agenda of activities Also to ensure the knowledgetransference processes among Hubs This will also include a preliminary calendar of the internal activities to keep track of the periodicity of the bilateral or multilateral meetings with the Hub members and the general management structure and attributions required when coordinating the Hubs

result.title: Sciencethon
result.description: Beyond the traditional intervention in social media top down from researchers to the public Sciencethon both face to face and digital will be organised with social actors from different fields to engage them as disseminators of the project in social media European ALLINTERACT Sciencethon will take place the same day in several European cities The activity will consist in providing a series of research problems identified and agreed by the consortium and the KAPI to be solved jointly by groups of 5 people composed by an experienced researcher and 4 other representatives of the target groups of ALLINTERACT

result.title: Policy Brief
result.description: A policy briefs collecting the main results of the project will be published It will focus on providing understandable message and recommendations to different stakeholders This policy brief will include Knowledge integrated from reports WP1WP4 task 51 on how citizens benefit from science and on successful awarenessraising initiatives successful action increasing citizen participation and successful action fostering the recruitment of new talent for sciences M20 Findings on the replicability of the identified successful actions and policyinforming month 30 first update

result.title: "Report 2 ""Initiatives which are making societal actors aware of the scientific research that led to the solutions they appreciate"""
